document.full_text: the growth rate for premium air travel fell significantly in march from the previous month because of the japan tsunami and earthquakes and arab world unrest, the international air transport association (iata) said on monday.
document.title: premium air travel growth rate slows in march
lines_and_colors: the growth rate for premium air travel fell significantly in march from the previous month because of the japan tsunami and earthquakes and arab world unrest, the international air transport association (iata) said on monday.
